hero.title: Elevate your product
hero.subtitle: Take the path to best-in-class UX and development for SaaS & enterprise apps

ignite.title: Ignite your practice
ignite.description: We'll guide you in building a strong, Agile-centered product design practice, efficient design systems, and team-wide processes.

evaluate.title: Evaluate your app's UX
evaluate.description: Our team of SaaS & enterprise usability specialists will conduct a UX design audit to highlight and prioritize areas for improvement.

scale.title: Scale up design
scale.description: Augment UX efforts on your team by bringing on a fractional design team member to take your product to the next level.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Trailmerge Ltd Co. All rights reserved.

about.title: About Trailmerge
about.subtitle: As your product design staffing and recruiting team, Trailmerge adapts to your startup's stage and processes to find you best-fit designers and leaders.

seo.title: About Trailmerge – UX Agency for B2B SaaS
seo.description: Trailmerge is a UI/UX agency specializing in B2B SaaS product design from MVP to first users and beyond. We scale with your product and business.
seo.keywords: about Trailmerge, UX design team, B2B SaaS experts, product design agency, Atlanta design team

vision.paragraph1: At Trailmerge, our vision is to promote abundance of life and opportunity.
vision.paragraph2: This drives how we operate with our team members and our clients – mentorship and development are a core part of who we are.
vision.paragraph3: This is also how we partner with our clients – journeying with internal teams to support their dreams for impact and their growth.

values.title: Our Values
values.value1: Opportunity for talented and passionate people
values.value3: Technology for people, not people for technology
values.value4: A culture of honor and freedom
values.value5: Our team members are human, not "resources"
values.value6: All of us grow and all of us mentor
